articles.title: U.S. tells diplomats' families to leave Ukraine, weighs troop options - Reuters
articles.description: The U.S. State Department announced Sunday it was ordering diplomats' family members to leave Ukraine, as U.S. President Joe Biden weighed options for boosting America's military assets in Eastern Europe to counter a buildup of Russian troops.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S22 European price leak suggests a base Ultra model with less RAM - The Verge
articles.description: European pricing information for Samsung’s upcoming Galaxy S22 lineup has been leaked. Although it appears Samsung carried over its pricing for its S21 lineup, it may be offering an equally-priced S22 Ultra with less RAM.
articles.content:
